name: Eagle AI
description: Eagle AI is a cutting-edge platform designed to democratize advanced digital asset analysis. By leveraging institutional-grade data feeds and state-of-the-art AI technology, Eagle AI provides unparalleled insights and predictive analytics for digital assets. Users can access real-time data, trend analysis, and market predictions through a user-friendly Telegram bot interface. The platform caters to both novice and experienced traders, ensuring everyone can make informed decisions with ease. Eagle AI's commitment to transparency, security, and innovation makes it a trusted tool in the digital asset space. Project Team: Jack Rockell - CTO https://www.linkedin.com/in/jack-rockell-841482267/ James Ratsma - CMO https://www.linkedin.com/in/james-ratsma-1024311b9/ Alan Ljungstr√∂m-Caunt - CTO https://www.linkedin.com/in/alanljungstromc
